info.name: Dark Google+
info.description: I'm using this in latest firefox with Compact Dark -theme on Gnome desktop with Global Dark Theme option on. Still lot of fixing to do.
info.additionalInfo:
2018-10-17 -this may be the last update

Sad to hear that Google will shutdown the G+, so there will be no updates to this style.
